body_html:
This is a question better suited to stack overflow, please post it there and tag it with 'tensorflow'

Also, GatherNd does have a gradient as of November 2nd (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/array_grad.py#L355) so you're probably using an older version of TensorFlow
